Package Board

Class BoardField

java.lang.Object
Board.BoardField
public class BoardField extends Object
A single field of a board, it stores information about its color, status and position

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardField

      public BoardField​(int row, int column, double xPosition, double yPosition, int playerColorID, int statusColorID)
      BoardField constructor, the board is made based on an int[][] array the field can be identified based on its position in that array
      Parameters:
      row - - the row of an array associated to this field
      column - - the column of an array associated to this field
      xPosition - - X axis position on the screen
      yPosition - - Y axis position on the screen
      playerColorID - - field current color
      statusColorID - - field current status
